trans-unit.source: Provides access to instances of the Visual Basic code generator and code compiler.
trans-unit.target: 提供存取 Visual Basic 程式碼產生器和程式碼編譯器的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This class provides methods that can be used to retrieve instances of the Visual Basic <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeGenerator> and <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeCompiler> implementations.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別提供可用來擷取執行個體的 Visual Basic 的方法<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeGenerator>和<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeCompiler>實作。</xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeCompiler> </xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeGenerator>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This class contains a link demand and an inheritance demand at the class level that applies to all members.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 這個類別包含的連結要求和繼承要求套用到所有成員的類別層級。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Security.SecurityException> is thrown when either the immediate caller or the derived class does not have full-trust permission.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Security.SecurityException>立即呼叫者或衍生的類別並沒有完全信任權限時，會擲回。</xref:System.Security.SecurityException>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.VBCodeProvider"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.VBCodeProvider"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.VBCodeProvider"></xref> class by using the specified provider options.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.VBCodeProvider"></xref>類別以使用指定的提供者選項。

trans-unit.source: The value for `providerOptions` is obtained from the element in the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 值`providerOptions`取自組態檔中的項目。

trans-unit.source: You can identify the version of the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.VBCodeProvider> you want to use by specifying the `<providerOption>` element, supplying "CompilerVersion" as the option name, and supplying the version number (for example, "v3.5") as the option value.
trans-unit.target: 您可以識別的新版<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.VBCodeProvider>您想要藉由指定使用`<providerOption>`項目，提供"項目的 CompilerVersion"做為選項名稱，並提供選項值的版本號碼 (例如，"v3.5")。</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.VBCodeProvider>

trans-unit.source: You must precede the version number with a lower case "v".
trans-unit.target: 您必須在使用小寫"v"的版本號碼。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary%602> object that contains the provider options from the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary%602>物件，其中包含提供者選項，從組態檔。

trans-unit.source: providerOptions is .
trans-unit.target: providerOptionsis .

trans-unit.source: Gets an instance of the Visual Basic code compiler.
trans-unit.target: 取得 Visual Basic 程式碼編譯器的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: An instance of the Visual Basic <xref href="System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeCompiler"></xref> implementation.
trans-unit.target: Visual Basic 的執行個體<xref href="System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeCompiler"></xref>實作。

trans-unit.source: Gets an instance of the Visual Basic code generator.
trans-unit.target: 取得 Visual Basic 程式碼產生器的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: An instance of the Visual Basic <xref href="System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeGenerator"></xref> implementation.
trans-unit.target: Visual Basic 的執行個體<xref href="System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeGenerator"></xref>實作。

trans-unit.source: Gets the file name extension to use when creating source code files.
trans-unit.target: 取得建立原始程式碼檔案時所要使用的副檔名。

trans-unit.source: This file name extension is usually the extension used by the language's source code files.
trans-unit.target: 此副檔名通常是使用語言的原始程式碼檔的副檔名。

trans-unit.source: The file name extension to use for generated source code files.
trans-unit.target: 要用於產生之原始程式碼檔案副檔名。

trans-unit.source: Generates code for the specified class member using the specified text writer and code generator options.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的文字寫入器和程式碼產生器選項的指定的類別成員產生程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Members are generated differently depending on their context.
trans-unit.target: 成員會以不同的方式產生，根據其內容。

trans-unit.source: For example, a method in an interface or a field in an enumeration is generated differently than a method or field on a class.
trans-unit.target: 例如，介面中的方法或欄位的列舉型別會產生不同的方法或類別上的欄位。

trans-unit.source: This implementation generates code for a member in the class context.
trans-unit.target: 此實作會產生程式碼中的類別內容的成員。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeTypeMember"></xref> to generate code for.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeTypeMember"> </xref>產生的程式碼。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.TextWriter> to write to.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.TextWriter>寫入。</xref:System.IO.TextWriter>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeGeneratorOptions"></xref> to use when generating the code.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeGeneratorOptions"> </xref>時產生程式碼使用。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter"></xref> for the specified type of object.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter"></xref>指定類型的物件。

trans-unit.source: A derived class can override this method to provide specific types of type converters for specific data types.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生的類別可以覆寫這個方法以提供特定類型的型別轉換子的特定資料類型。

trans-unit.source: The type of object to retrieve a type converter for.
trans-unit.target: 要擷取的類型轉換子的物件類型。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter"></xref> for the specified type.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter"> </xref>指定的類型。

trans-unit.source: Gets a language features identifier.
trans-unit.target: 取得語言功能識別項。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.CodeDom.Compiler.LanguageOptions"></xref> that indicates special features of the language.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.CodeDom.Compiler.LanguageOptions"> </xref>表示語言的特殊功能。
